data.name: EVE Online: Platinum Starter Pack
data.detailed_description:
Steam Created Accounts Only

This content can only be accessed with EVE Online accounts created through Steam. Existing EVE Online accounts not created through Steam cannot benefit from it.


About the Game

Mine in style in New Eden with an amazing 90 days of Omega time, 1,500 PLEX, the new Orca Radioactive Reclamation SKIN, an Expert Cerebral Accelerator, and an invigorating 650,000 bonus Skill Points bundled in one energizing package, accelerating you toward a future of your own making!

The Platinum Starter Pack brings excellent value, so you can train faster, mine in style, inject the Skill Points where you need them, and use your PLEX in the New Eden Store or sell it for ISK!

Pack Contents:

  • 90 days of Omega - Train faster, do more!
  • 1,500 PLEX - Sell for ISK in-game!
  • 650,000 Skill Points - Your fast track to improved skills!
  • Orca Radioactive Reclamation SKIN - Mine in style!
  • Expert Cerebral Accelerator

Single purchase per account.

data.short_description: Turbo-charge your career with 90 days Omega time, 1,500 PLEX, 650,000 Skill Points and more!
data.supported_languages:
English*, German*, Russian*, French*, Korean*, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core @ 2.0 GHz, AMD Dual Core @ 2.0 GHz)
  • Memory: 4 GB or higher
  • Hard Drive: 23 GB Free Space
  • Video: AMD Radeon 5450 or NVIDIA GeForce 420 or better with at least 1024 MB VRAM
  • Network: ADSL connection (or faster)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-7700 or AMD Ryzen 7 1700 @ 3.6 GHz or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB or greater
  • Hard Drive: 23 GB free space
  • Video: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 580 or better with at least 4 GB VRAM
  • Network: ADSL connection or faster

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Supported OS: Mac OS X 10.14
  • Processor: Intel i5 @ 2.5 GHz | Apple M1
  • Memory: 4 GB
  • Hard Drive: 23 GB Free Space
  • Video: Intel HD 4000
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 12
  • Processor: Intel i7 Series @ 3.8 GHz or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB or higher
  • Hard Drive: 23 GB free space
  • Video: AMD Radeon Pro 5700 or better with at least 8 GB VRAM

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy EVE Online: Platinum Starter Pack
